## Load Libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(here)
```
## Make a plot with penguin data 
```{r}
penguins %>% ##using the penguin dataset
  ggplot(aes(x=bill_length_mm, 
             y=bill_depth_mm, 
             color=species)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + #add a linear regression 
  labs(x="Bill Length (mm)", 
       y="Bill Depth (mm)", 
       color = "Species") + 
  theme_bw()
```
